About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Pesonen was born in August of 2020. She loves to meet new people and animals. Pesonen is an only pet so she can always be in the center of attention.

Waking everybody up

Pesonen is the alarm clock of the house. She makes sure that everybody is up before 7am to play with her and take her for a morning walk.

Daily walks

Multiple walks a day keeps Pesonen happy and calm while inside. This also insures that the whole family cannot just sit inside all day.

Making everybody happy

Pesonen makes sure that everyone in the house has a healthy sleeping and exercising schedules. With her funny face she keeps everyone happy.
